meanings.definition: The practices, beliefs, or way of life of nomads.
meanings.sent1: Nomadisms involve moving from place to place in search of food and water.
meanings.sent2: Learning about different nomadisms helps us understand diverse cultures.
meanings.sent3: The nomadisms of ancient tribes often revolved around following animal herds.
meanings.sent4: Her nomadisms were like a dance, fluid and ever-changing.
meanings.sent5: The nomadisms of the Bedouin people are deeply rooted in tradition.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a nomad.
meanings.sent1: The nomadisms of the desert dwellers fascinated the young explorer.
meanings.sent2: His nomadisms led him to discover hidden oases in the vast desert.
meanings.sent3: She admired the nomadisms of the wandering tribes, always on the move.
meanings.sent4: In the nomadisms of the past, survival was the ultimate goal.
meanings.sent5: The nomadisms of the ancient world were filled with adventure and uncertainty.
